system_summary: This system provides an AI-powered agent to analyze Git repositories, generate insights, and optionally visualize repository structures, accessible via a command-line interface.

components.label: GitHub Agent Service
components.role: Orchestrates interactions with GitHub repositories, fetches code, and manages project analysis workflows, including smart push operations.

components.label: AI Analysis Service
components.role: Leverages AI models, specifically LLMs, to perform deep code analysis, generate summaries, and evaluate repository projects based on fetched data.

components.label: Repository Processor
components.role: Processes repository data, potentially generating visualizations or structured information about the codebase for deeper insights.

components.label: CLI Tool
components.role: Provides a command-line interface for users to initiate repository analysis, view results, or manage system operations.

components.label: GitHub API
components.role: The external Git hosting platform providing programmatic access to repositories and acting as a source/destination for data.

connections.label: Fetches repository data and interacts with Git services
Sends project context for AI analysis
Passes repository data for structural analysis or visualization
